English
There's a dark side behind the bright lights of Las Vegas, where desperate
lives and busted dreams struggle in the shadows to survive. And when a sleazy
casino owner swipes $20 million from his employees' health insurance and
pension funds, ex-pro-baseball-player-turned-casino-electrician Nick and his
co-workers put together a daring plan to steal the money back. But in a lowdown
town of underground cage fights, smoky strip clubs and deadly double-crosses,
can the perfect heist ever go as planned?
